app.title: EC0249 ¬∑ Educational Consulting Platform
app.description: Interactive educational platform for EC0249 certification - Provide general consulting services
app.footer: ¬© {{year}} EC0249 Educational Platform. Developed for general consulting certification according to CONOCER standards.

dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to the educational platform for EC0249 certification - Provide general consulting services
dashboard.progressDescription: Continue with Module 1 to advance in your certification

modules.title: Learning Module System
modules.subtitle: Master EC0249 competencies through structured content and practical activities

module1.title: Consulting Fundamentals
module1.description: Basic concepts, ethics, and interpersonal skills necessary for professional consulting.

lesson1_1.title: Introduction to Consulting
lesson1_1.overview: Historical foundations and characteristics of professional consulting
objectives: Understand the historical evolution of consulting
Identify key characteristics of a consultant
Distinguish between internal and external consulting
Know the stages of the consulting process

introduction.title: What is Consulting?
introduction.text: Consulting is a professional service that helps organizations solve problems, improve processes, and achieve specific objectives. A consultant brings specialized knowledge, experience, and an objective external perspective.

timeline.description: Origins in industrial engineering and time-motion studies
Development of management and business strategy consulting
Expansion into information technology and human resources
Specialization in digital transformation and sustainability

stages.description: Identification and analysis of the problem or situation
Measurement of results and necessary adjustments

activities.title: Competency Self-Assessment
activities.description: Evaluate your current skills as a consultant

activities.title: Successful Consulting Cases
activities.description: Analyze real examples of consulting projects

lesson1_2.title: Ethics and Confidentiality
lesson1_2.overview: Fundamental ethical principles and confidentiality management in consulting
objectives: Know the consultant's code of ethics
Make ethical decisions in complex situations

principles.description: Act with honesty and transparency in all interactions
Maintain and develop specialized knowledge and skills
Maintain impartiality and avoid conflicts of interest
Assume consequences of decisions and recommendations

items: Be transparent about limitations and risks
Act for the benefit of public interest

types.description: Economic interests that may affect objectivity
Working with competitors or related industries

activities.title: Ethical Dilemmas
activities.description: Analyze complex situations and make ethical decisions

lesson1_3.title: Interpersonal Skills
lesson1_3.overview: Development of communication and relational competencies for consultants

activeListening.title: Active Listening
techniques: Give full attention to the speaker

techniques.description: Identification of factors for and against

strategies.when: When both parties have legitimate interests
When there is time pressure or limited resources
When the issue is more important to the other party
When the conflict is temporary or minor

activities.title: Difficult Meeting Simulation
activities.description: Practice conflict management in complex meetings

problem_description.title: Document describing the identified problem
problem_description.description: Comprehensive document describing the identified problematic situation
evaluationCriteria: Includes the impact of the current situation
Establishes the scope of the problem
Contains interpretation of the problem and its impacts

problem_statement.title: Problem Description
problem_statement.placeholder: Clearly describe the identified problematic situation...
problem_statement.guidance: Exhaustive description including context, symptoms and manifestations

scope_definition.title: Problem Scope
scope_definition.placeholder: Define the scope and limits of the problem...
scope_definition.guidance: Specify affected areas, processes and people

current_impact.title: Current Situation Impact
current_impact.guidance: Quantify operational, financial and personnel impacts

human_impact.title: Personnel Impact
human_impact.placeholder: Describe the impact on human resources...

problem_interpretation.title: Problem Interpretation
problem_interpretation.placeholder: Provide your professional interpretation of the problem and its implications...
problem_interpretation.guidance: Grounded interpretation based on conducted analysis

current_situation_impact.title: Detected impact of current situation
current_situation_impact.description: Detailed analysis of impacts and effects of the current situation

impact_analysis.title: Congruency Analysis
impact_analysis.placeholder: Explain the congruency between detected impacts and integrated information...
impact_analysis.guidance: Analysis demonstrating coherence with collected information

information_integration.title: Integration of presented information
information_integration.description: Synthesis and organization of all collected information
evaluationCriteria: Is congruent with the problem posed by the client

congruency_analysis.title: Problem Congruency Analysis
congruency_analysis.placeholder: Analyze the congruency between collected information and the posed problem...
congruency_analysis.guidance: Demonstrate coherence between information and problematic

information_interpretation.title: Information Interpretation
information_interpretation.placeholder: Provide your professional interpretation of collected information...

methodology_report.title: Report of employed methodology
methodology_report.description: Complete description of methodology used for problem identification
evaluationCriteria: Includes definition of situation and/or problem
Includes establishment of studies/tests to perform
Includes establishment of field observation program
Contains how information obtained is evaluated

consultant_resources.guidance: Resources to be provided by consultant
